title: Fifty-one percent attack
description: If more than half the computer power on a network is run by a single person or a single group of people, then a 51% attack is in operation.

props.body: If more than half the computer power on a network is run by a single person or a single group of people, then a 51% attack is in operation. This means this entity has full control of the network and can negatively affect a cryptocurrency by halting mining, disabling staking, stopping or changing transactions, and reusing coins.
